title: NTC to increase concessions for Sisu Seriya drivers
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The National Transport Commission (NTC) has taken steps to increase the concessions provided to private and SLTB bus employees employed by Sisu Seriya.
The Chairman of the (NTC), Commander Nilan Miranda said that steps had been taken to increase the fare from Rs. 57/- per kilometer to Rs.80/-.
Multiple roads around parliament closed on Thursday (5) & Friday (6)
